name: Alien Shocktrooper M-Frame
effectText:
2 Reptile monsters
(Quick Effect): You can discard 1 monster; place A-Counters equal to its original Level on face-up monster(s) on the field, distributed as you wish. If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect and sent to the GY: You can Special Summon non-Link Reptile monsters with different names from your GY, up to the number of monsters your opponent controls with A-Counters. You can only use each effect of "Alien Shocktrooper M-Frame" once per turn.
